name: Stranded on Earth
description:
NOTE: Reload the page if you want to play the game a second time. The game gets buggy after one playthrough.

Stranded from Earth

You are Jelarp, a being split between 3 separate bodies. Whilst flying your spaceship, you crash landed on an unknown planet and were captured by the hostile locals. Therefore, you have no other choice but to fight your way out.

Control 3 separate characters at the same time!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Shoot

1, 2, 3 - Switch cameras

Submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2021
